Articles.Content:
Does anyone know how I could acquire some of the textures used in the KSC and the island runway? Specifically, I am looking for the sandy/gravelly texture used on the island runway and on the level 1 launchpad, which can be seen here in the image above.

Does the texture even belong to squad? If so, am I even allowed to use it? I wish to use it for the purposes of modding, specifically for creating my own launch site for the kerbal konstructs mod.

I would guess that this does belong to Squad (would be surprised if it didn't). As for using it - I've seen this question ask a number of times before and the general consensus was that if you don't distribute the textures but refer to them where they're installed by Squad your OK. As for finding them - afraid I can't help you there.
